input_args.passage: 'Pete Dexter | Dexter holds a position as Writer in Residence in the creative writing program at the University of South Dakota. He lives in Vermillion, South Dakota, near the ...'
input_args.claim: 'From, we learn that Elie Wiesel was a Mellon Professor in the Humanities at Boston University where he taught “Literature of Memory.” He was also the Chairman of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council.'
